name: nlu-devops
description: A collection of Azure DevOps extensions to run NLU.DevOps and visualize results.

scripts.lint: npm run lintCommon && npm run lintTasks && npm run eclint
scripts.lintFix: npm run lintCommon -- --fix && npm run lintTasks -- --fix && npm run eclintFix
scripts.buildCommon: npm-recursive-install --rootDir=common && tsc -p common && npm pack common/nlu-devops-common/
scripts.build: npm run buildCommon && npm run buildTasks
